import React from "react"; import { Btn } from './Button'; class DetailsHero extends React.Component { state = { counter: 1 } updateButton = () => { second } render() { const productKey = this.props.link; const findKey = this.props.boxs.find(el => el.image.includes(productKey)); return (
{ findKey.price }

{ findKey.name }

{ findKey.description }

color: pink
); } } export default DetailsHero;
